使用船新的音频系统PipeWire
事实上PipeWire相比传统的音频系统并没有明显优势
但是官方gif很好看
安装 sudo pacman -S pipewire pipewire-audio pipewire-pulse pipewire-alsa pipewire-jack wireplumber lib32-pipewire lib32-pipewire-jack --needed 启用 systemctl enable pipewire --user systemctl enable pipewire-pulse --user
title: 船新的音频系统PipeWire
